title: Guinness® braised lamb shanks
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '4 lamb shanks', '1 onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '2 celery sticks, chopped', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 (330ml) can Guinness® or stout', '400ml beef stock', '3 sprigs fresh thyme', '3 sprigs fresh parsley', '1 bay leaf', '1 sprig fresh rosemary', 'salt and pepper to taste']
